about.content: imagem: fabio_sales.png, PP h1: From Newsroom Leadership to Digital Engineering I am an executive leader and creative technologist with a unique dual background: 30 years shaping visual culture in mass media and a robust present in software engineering and digital transformation. For three decades, I directed multidisciplinary teams at Estadão, Diário de Notícias and Correio Braziliense, translating complex data into impactful storytelling for millions of readers. That experience taught me that design is useless without structure. The Pivot to Tech. Since 2010, I have codified that experience into digital products. I don't just "manage" transformation; I build it. My expertise now spans the full stack, from Svelte, React, Javascript and Python development to SQL database manipulation, ERP implementation, and process automation. Today, as the Director of Transformation and Innovation at ATBL, I combine strategic vision (Strategy) with hands-on execution (Code). Whether recognized as a LinkedIn Top Voice or delivering lectures at global conferences like SND and Malofiej, my mission remains the same: helping organizations thrive by merging design, technology, and business intelligence. {cronologia} titulo: Career Milestones periodo: ATBL (2025–Present). Driving corporate strategy and administrative management, while leading technical initiatives like ERP integration and custom app development. periodo: Independent Consultant (2023–2025). Full-stack development (Svelte/Node) and business process automation for SMBs. periodo: Estadão (2005–2023). Executive Art Editor. Led the visual culture and digital migration for Brazil’s oldest newspaper, transforming complex communication projects into excellence in graphic journalism and visual design. periodo: Diário de Notícias (Portugal, 2003–2005). Consultant and Art Director. Led a redesign recognized as the "Best Designed Newspaper in Iberia" (SND-e). periodo: Strategic Consulting & Training. Led visual strategy, redesigns, and newsroom training for international media (Milenio, Diario Gestión, La República, Diário de Notícias) and major Brazilian groups (Grupo Positivo, Correio da Bahia and Jornal do Commercio). periodo: Academic & Thought Leadership. Former lecturer at ESPM and Senac. Speaker at major design summits (SND, Malofiej, ANJ) and undergraduate design programs in Brazil. periodo: Systems & Tech Background. Consultant at Unisys for content managment systems (CMS) and Visual Programmer for financial software at NV Consultoria, bridging the gap between logic and design since 1995. {}
